definitions: in a relaxed and informal way

examples.text: she was just casually strolling through the mall
the family was casually dressed in jeans and sweaters

definitions: in a way that lacks sufficient care or thoughtfulness

examples.text: people who casually throw garbage around the streets

shortDefinitions: in way that lacks sufficient care or thoughtfullness

definitions: without commitment or permanence; occasionally or irregularly

examples.text: I work casually as a staff nurse
I wouldn't introduce my family to people I was casually dating
